data.text: We know you can’t see our smile right now; so instead, we’ll show you our hearts. #TogetherWeKeepFlying https://t.co/wuuZD2M8zW

@destinpaloma @destinpaloma, allow us to mention you that basic fare as well as routes from/to USA or CAN doesn´t include checked luggage. Please get in contact with us at 1 800 237 6639 in USA where we´ll be able to provide a formal response from a reservation agent directly. ST

@destinpaloma with the agent who assisted you before. Unfortunately, in deed basica fare doesn't include checked luggage without charge only 1 piece of carry on luggage. We remain at your service...2/2 ST

@destinpaloma @destinpaloma, We regret all the inconveniences you've had during your flight experience with us. We do ask you be so kind to contact us at 1 800 237 6639 in USA where a representative of ours will be able to check your booking and also review the call you had...1/2 ST

data.text: @HenryZhao2 Henry, please be so kind to send your booking information at amcomplaint@aeromexico.com where you will be contacted and we will be able to provide you a formal response. ST

@HenryZhao2 Henry, We gladly share with you the following link: https://t.co/5l2rLG1PCv where you will be able to verify the options we have to refund your ticket if it applies. If you need more information please contact us at 1 800 237 6639 where an agent will be pleased to assist you. ST

Travel to Mexico City with the routes that we are restarting from San Fransisco, Denver, and Las Vegas. Start planning today and fly when you're ready.
